name: gemini-pair-pipeline
description: Multi-agent orchestration for complex coding tasks with Gemini MCP (jamubc/gemini-mcp-tool). Scouts gather raw context, planners synthesize XML architectural instructions for gemini-3-flash-preview. Returns full plan with per-file instructions. Iterative discovery with user checkpoints and parallel execution. Orchestrator manages all context (Gemini is fully one-shot).
